title: lukeja
author: lukeja
content: It'd be interesting to know how people find and analyse good long term projects that made insane profits. Can you list:1. How you found the coin2. Why you believed in the project3. Why are you still holding or why you soldI am not a millonaire yet but I bought HEX at $.05 about a year ago and sold at $.20. I thought a made a nice profit but HEX did another 2.5x. I found HEX by watching a youtube channel and I believe in HEX because Richard Heart seems like a smart dude. I sold because I was dumb back then.

comments.author: bonyaserg
comments.body: Personally, I think in order to be a millionaire, you need to be a lucky person and of course follow the development of the cryptocurrency market. Since many people did not believe in the crypto market before and only a few bought the first coins and now these people have become rich. At the moment, a metaverse is developing in the Crete industry and I can say that after an indefinite time, many who bought these coins will receive excellent profits. So now make a choice for yourself what to invest in.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Different cryptocurrencies have made investors millionaires during bull seasons, but the main one must be bitcoin, since it's the original crypto among all, which gave origin to crypto market and every altcoins. Stories of success involving bitcoin adopters are common and there are even people who wrote books to share their experience and inspire others to thrive in financial world. However, we must be careful with such stories and always look for evidence they are legit, as there are many scammers trying to lure people into altcoin investments promising returns they can't guarantee and telling facts about their personal success that aren't true.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: In terms of dollar, I'm not YET a millionaire. I'm leaning forward towards to the greatest price of bitcoin that we will see in the future. I didn't ride the hype of ICOs and I'm sure that's where most of the people got their fortune in life.I'm not rushing into that fortune.But I know that someday that by holding bitcoin, I'm going to be there and if not, I'll be close to that goal by everyone that will make us wealthy or be financially free.

comments.author: bakasabo
comments.body: I doubt there are any millionaires on this forum right now. I believe crypto millionaires dont spend time posting on bitcointalk. Vitalik Buterin has an account here, but I think it is abandoned by him. On the other hand, I dont think that millionaires will share any info about their wealth here, because this might be dangerous. I used to hold NOIA tokens when their price was less than one cent. Selling them at ATH wont make me a millionaire, but it definitely gonna improve my life. I used to hold some bounty tokens and sold the early, but that would only bring me thousands instead of hundreds.

comments.author: Dart18
comments.body: Nothing yet. I am trying to purchase and accumulate more Bitcoin as I can, thinking it could make me a millionaire someday. I don't want to be like other investors who tries to buy altcoins wihout having any idea what it is and expecting to make them millions in a blink of an eye. That's an inviting way to get yourself broke. It's too risky and the assurance is way low than any trusted coin. comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.created_time: July 05, 2022, 08:53:18 PMLast edit: July 09, 2022, 04:30:19 PM by Xal0lex
comments.body: HEX is a common shitcoin, which was pumped out at the expense of yobit-influencers. With such projects can become a millionaire only the creator of the project, or those who invested earlier, even at the stage of seed investment. This project does not have as much liquidity and capitalization to make ordinary investors millionaires . So, such projects in the long term should be avoided, it is a one-time investment and they pay off only when you enter the project before the crowd. If you went in for $100 and made 50x profit, it doesn't mean that the project will make even more money and with even more investment in the future.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I am not yet a millionaire and still trying to go that way. That is not easy to become a millionaire, especially in crypto because many coins out there have promises to go to the moon. If you can get a coin that helps you become a millionaire, you are lucky and should use your time to sell it at a high price. But if you can buy bitcoin and focus on accumulating more bitcoins, I am sure sooner or later, you will become a millionaire, especially if you can sell it at a high price. I do not have HEX as you but I have the other coins and I hope those coins can give me a big profit later.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: There are some people who really became millionaires both from buying early coins and joining bounties from the year 2018 and below. Back then, there are few choices so you can actually land a real project and grow your investment a lot every month. Nowadays, they are only legends and only a few successful stories you heard from them about once a year because of the huge numbers of coins you need to research which one is real. That's why people nowadays are lazy to investigate and the result is always failing to choose the right project to invest their money with.

comments.author: Jaered
comments.body: Millionaire is a relative term and you have to specify if its a dollar millionaire or a local currency millionaire. If the former, then no. But if the later, yes. Made my first million years ago from a bounty Ixinium which was conducted by Arteezy who is unfortunately no more doing bounties. Quite a haul it was. Also made millions from other bounties. If the former, I have only made 5k USD from a bounty sale from Youcoin
